 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְדֵּס‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==preserve, park== (loan-word from Zend <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pairi-daêza***</u></abbr>, ***enclosure***, [[BDB#Spieg|Spieg]] Haug in [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>Jahrb.</sup> see 162 f., compare [[BDB#Spieg|Spieg]]<sup>Avesta i. 293</sup>; Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pâlêz*** [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh. 75, 211</sup>, Kurdish <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***parês***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxvi (1882), 182</sup>; hence Armenian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***partêz***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Arm. Stud. § 1878</sup>, late Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pardisu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>ZA vi. 290</sup>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">παράδεισος</span>; compare also [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pa 95 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>[[Gen.2.8|Gen 2:8]]</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפּ‎</span> [[Neh.2.8|Neh 2:8]] (containing trees); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְדֵּס רִמּוֺנִים‎</span> [[Song.4.13|Song 4:13]] (fruit-trees and costly plants); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְדֵּסִים‎</span> [[Eccl.2.5|Eccl 2:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּנּוֺת‎</span>).
